Mourinho deputy calanca told reporters

Mourinho Kaka talks on Monday 45 minutes later, Kaka was told that their future no longer belongs to Madrid. Warm-up match against Real Madrid in the evening on Tuesday (microblogging), Oviedo, Kaka has also been temporarily withdrawn from the list of Real Madrid game.

Previously in a few hours ago against Real Oviedo, Real Madrid official announced a 23-man game list, but only after tens of minutes, Real Madrid's 23-man squad suddenly become 22 attentive fans found that the 2007 soccer ball Mr. quietly between scored. Shaheen excusable because of gastroenteritis did not enter the list, Benzema is just to the team, did not match fit so there is no short-listed. Carvalho declared to have been abandoned at the beginning of the new season. Kaka just the day before yesterday with the team together had finished, and no signs of injury, suddenly win is very unexpected, but that the world sends a message Monday Kaka Jose Mourinho talk results : club team jerseysReal Madrid next season, definitely do not need 65 million Mr. Kaka.

Bernabeu tour how much Kaka a bit chilling. Just before last summer, Kaka, Real Madrid executives informed will be reused in the new season the Galacticos very highly of him, looking forward Kaka to reproduce the elegance of the year in Milan. This commitment was not honored, on the contrary Kaka time and time again to be notified to leave the bench until Reaclub team jerseyl Madrid in order to get rid of this burden in Kaka, almost no demand costs, they are willing cheap Brazilians to 10 million euros of the price of cabbage.

Real Madrid (microblogging), once Brazil A-level league team Corinthians Recommend to Kaka, but the Brazilians do not want to be when playing back to Brazil to play, his goal is still in European competition, because only active in the top league have a chance to represent Brazil set off the 2014 World Cup in Brazil. The media once broke the news to Paris Saint-Germain to the introduction of Kaka, but was the team manager Leonardo himself denied that. Kaka at Real Madrid suffered an unprecedented dilemma, stay played on the game, leaving the team is not the right buyer. Thrown an olive branch at this time Kaka's former club AC Milan (microblogging).

Milan, the city has never forgotten their prince, Kaka return to Milan road is not completely blocked. AC Milan is also positive for the introduction of Kaka doing efforts to sell a series to go Tiago - Silva and Zlatan Ibrahimovic in the summer, the president Silvio Berlusconi has been the consistent abuse of the fans, he needs to sign once Milan City idol to appease about depression Milan fans. Secondly, Kaka's wages is not hindered. Once a card commitments to join AC Milan, the inevitable choice to take a pay cut, two Milan sell Silva Ibrahimovic, with plenty of cap space to bear the wages of Kaka.

After the match, Mourinho deputy calanca told reporters, Real Madrid to seek an optimal solution with Kaka kick down Real Madrid's first warm-up. Calanca: on the card, we find the most suitable program for him, he is part of the team, we look forward to an early settlement of this issue. "The most appropriate solution? "Marca published Wednesday provided another answer: the American League New York Red Bulls. Since the introduction of Henry, the Red Bull New York, a growing number of European media reports. This ambitious team and the successful club team jersey replicaintroduction of the Premier League headed king - Tim Cahill, the next goal is the Bernabeu Kaka, and the transfer fee and wages in the opulence U.S. team eyes is not a problem. The only obstacle is the card to be able to willingly go to America to play. But not much time left to Kaka thinking.

Ayala Oviedo, Real Madrid will be rushed to the non-stop to Lisbon, to prepare for three days after the game with Sporting Lisbon. In the remaining 72 hours, Kaka would definitely miss to catch the fly to Lisbon, and even the United States, Real Madrid plane only leave his fate. The future go? Kaka has 72 hours of time to think, he could choose to talk to Jose Mourinho or Florentino discussions, but a done deal to leave reality almost Kaka can not find the opportunity of any mediation. Seemingly innocuous 72 hours, almost the last time of the Brazilian Kaka in the Galacticos.

Mike Smith doesn't have a very good overall NFLX record

NFL Preseason 2012: <a href="http://www.newenglandpatriotsnikestore.com/new-england-patriots-jersey/brandon-lloyd-jersey.html">Brandon Lloyd Jerseys</a>Atlanta Falcons vs Miami Dolphins Betting Preview

The Miami Dolphins have made headlines for all the wrong reasons this preseason, but the Atlanta Falcons have been flying under the radar. Today, the two meet in what will be a lopsided first half.

Coaches

Mike Smith doesn't have a very good overall NFLX record. With his two losses this year, his total drops to 6-12. Thankfully, for our purposes, the only relevant stats that I'm looking at are the first half results from the previous two games. In games against the Baltimore Ravens and the Cincinnati Bengals, the Falcons went into halftime with a convincing lead.

Meanwhile, the Dolphins have gotten completely owned in both <a href="http://www.newenglandpatriotsnikestore.com/new-england-patriots-jersey/brandon-lloyd-jersey.html?elite=6">Brandon Lloyd Elite Jersey</a>of their preseason games so far. The Tampa Bay Buccaneers made quick work of Miami's starting unit and it wasn't much better when they faced Cam Newton and company either. Coach Joe Philbin has told the media that they were primarily focused on the passing game in those games and that they will return to a more balanced attack when they host Atlanta (CBSsports. com).

Markets

The Falcons opened at minus-1 favorites and that was quickly pushed to minus-3 with early money (odds courtesy of SBRforum). If i was setting the halftime line, <a href="http://www.newenglandpatriotsnikestore.com/new-england-patriots-jersey/brandon-lloyd-jersey.html?games=7">Brandon Lloyd Game Jersey</a>I would have Atlanta favored by more than a field goal as the second half matchup is a wash.

Quarterbacks

Matt Ryan has a taken a lot of flak over recent years for his inability to be a difference-maker in the big games. Count me as one of his critics, but it's obvious the guy has the necessary tools to succeed.

The Dolphins would just be happy if they could get in the re

Now he has another elite wideout in Julio Jones to lean on and so far the new Dirk Koetter offense has been a big hit. In two games, Ryan is 27 of 34 for 329 yards and has had two touchdowns. Don't be surprised if we see another repeat performance against a Dolphins secondary still looking to prove themselves.

Atlanta was in the red zone three times vs the Bengals and only ran the ball once. Koetter told the media they already know what Michael Turner and company can do on the ground (CBSsports. com). Right now, it's all about synchronizing the downfield passing attack. Brandon Lloyd Youth JerseyI don't expect that to change in this game and Ryan says they are focusing on improving the red-zone efficiency (AtlantaFalcons. com).

The Dolphins would just be happy if they could get in the red zone, let alone worry about converting touchdowns. Miami's starters have been outscored 24-0 in the first quarters of both games this preseason. It doesn't seem to matter if it's Matt Moore or Ryan Tannehill, there is nobody reliable to throw to.

This week we'll get another look at Tannehill asBrandon Spikes JerseyI he's been named the teams starter going forward. I really don't like his chances throwing into a trio of Brent Grimes, Dunta Robinson, and Asante Samuel. Returning to the run game is a good idea and will give them their best chance to put up some points.

Miami has named their quarterback in rookie Ryan Tannehill

NFL Preseason Atlanta Falcons and Miami Dolphins Start Time, Odds
The NFL Preseason still has a few weeks left and tonight the Atlanta Falcons travel to take on the Miami Dolphins. The game is scheduled for a 7: 30 pm EST start time and it will be televised locally and on the NFL RedZone. Currently the odds for the game have the Falcons favored by a field goal.

Atlanta comes into the game with an 0-2 record to date, having dropped back-to-back games at home to Balitmore and Cincinnati. Sure, they were able to put up points of their own in those contests, but the bigger concern might be the amount of points they've been able to give up. A total of 55 points were scored by the Ravens and Bengals against Atlanta so far this season and it's obvious if the Falcons want to return to the playoffs, they'll have to get better at that. However, it's still the preseason and the Falcons have two weeks to shore up that defense. Problem is, both of their final two preseason contests are on the road, beginning tonight in Miami. Atlanta QB Matt Ryan has seen quite a bit of the field in the opening two games, completing 27-of-34 passes for 329 yards and two touchdowns in his first two games. He'll look to continue that tonight against a Dolphins' defense that has given up a combined 429 yards through the air so far.

Miami has named their quarterback in rookie Ryan Tannehill, who has looked impressive in his time on the field so far for the Dolphins. Miami has obviously been searching a long time for a franchise quarterback since the Dan Marino days and the team believes fully that they've found their guy. Miami has started the season at 0-2 much like Atlanta, but a young team can benefit greatly from learning during the preseason games. Miami has lost a game both on the road and at home.

Free Pick: We like the Dolphins getting the points at home. It's hard to go against an NFL team at home when they are an underdog. We like the progression of Tannehill so far and are projecting him to have another good game tonight. Take the home team and the points.

Bayern eliminated Real Madrid,

“It was a great, enormous game. We lost, we are sad and they are happy but that’s football” — It’s said by Jose Mourinho.Bayern eliminated Real Madrid, Real Madrid coach Jose Mourinho said: “This is the football players were quite outstanding performance, demonstrated incredible willpower, but our opponents on the weekendvacation, and we played the most crucial game in a league away from the finals only a little shy. the game the two sides compete for very intense, and the scene was very close, the process of ups and downs. the score tied after 2 to 1, two The teams try to avoid errors.When talking about the situation after the penalty shootout, Mourinho said: “the penalty is painful, but compared to my own, more players were sad. I am also very sad, but now we need strong.season, we took a long absence, the King’s Cup, this season as long as a chance to 6 points can be won in the league, this is progress. I am proud, I do not what to blame, I was coaching such a teamproud. After all, football is. “Misses from C.Ronaldo Kaka and Ramos proved crucial and team-mate Xabi Alonso - who scored his penalty - accepts dealing with the disappointment is part of the game.But Alonso insists this was not a factor on Wednesday.Different competitions,” said the 30-year-old. “We have forgotten already what happened on Saturday. We were focused.We (now) have to start thinking about the domestic competition, starting on Sunday.That’s football you have to enjoy it and suffer it.”Asked who he favoured to win the final between Bayern Alonso added: “I don’t have any preference. I will be watching as a football fan and whoever deserves it will get it.”Real’s captain, goalkeeper Iker Casillas, saved two penalties in the shoot-out but still found himself on the losing side.And Casillas is not too downhearted by his team’s efforts, having won the game 2-1 on the night.”It was a very exciting match but in the end penalties are always a lottery,” said Casillas.”We shouldn’t dwell on it too much. We played very well, created chances and passed the ball around well.”

Higuain worthy of Real Madrid blessing of title

Higuain worthy of Real Madrid (microblogging) blessing of the title, once again, he became a Real Madrid to win the final battle to win hero. Athletic Bilbao fans extremely hostile atmosphere Shengmameisi stadium, Real Madrid got 32 on the La Liga (microblogging) trophy in club history. Interestingly, and four years ago in Pamplona to help Real Madrid summit, Higuain presented a priceless goal in the win of the night. In addition, Real Madrid won the La Liga champions in 2007, the goal Higuain also played an important role.Spain "Le Monde" said after the game, Higuain again the team came through on his shoulders, he has once again become the protagonist of the Real Madrid won the night, like a repeat of the same old movies, Higuain in the team most in need , when they play the role of the lone hero. The Argentine show standards, and demonstrated the ability to fight. Throughout the week, the media exposed the news about Higuain will leave Real Madrid after the end of the season, but Iraq melon because of his own future where he must play well and the current football, to prove their for the existence of Real Madrid is very important.Before Real Madrid against Athletic Bilbao, Barcelona (microblogging) in the home win over Malaga, despite the victory against Barcelona only consolation, but Real Madrid in order to win in advance, had to beat away Bilbao Pakistan Hubei competitive job. However, Athletic Bilbao fans of Real Madrid has always been unfriendly, rejected the contractor of the King's Cup final this season at Real Madrid, the Basque Lions fans on Real Madrid's attitude is even more harsh, so the atmosphere is not suitable for Real Madrid win . However, the Real Madrid squad Higuain, the Argentines are good at the outbreak in the face of adversity, in C Ronaldo missing a penalty after 16 minutes of Barcelona, ??he kicked accurate shot blew open the Athletic Bilbao goal, the ball close to goal left column into the net, Athletic Bilbao goalkeeper Golkar did not do anything. In 2008, Higuain once again proved the ability to decide the game at the crucial moment.Iguazu because Real Madrid open cans, after Real Madrid's victory is also a matter of course. There is no doubt that Higuain has once again become a crucial figure in the most important moment, he once again helped Real Madrid lock the Spanish champions. Higuain is the "mascot" of Real Madrid, he always used the key goal to bring luck to the team. May 12, 2007, Real Madrid, the Spaniards, when the game 89 minutes, the two sides of the score is still 3, the key moment Higuain appeared, he scored a decisive one goal for Real Madrid to get a valuable three points, Fabio Capello's Real Madrid also points standings beyond Barcelona leapt to the head, and ultimately reversing Barcelona win. After one season, Higuain broke out in the final stage of the season game of the 2007-08 season against Osasuna, Higuain 89 minutes into the go-ahead a ball to help Real Madrid to achieve the final victory of the competition, helping Real Madrid to take to the first 31 league titles.Real Madrid last 3 wins have Higuain of Argentina's "key man" figure, if Real Madrid ultimately let go of the key man, perhaps it is a huge regret. Marca reported that Higuain feel he is a pure Real Madrid, under normal circumstances he would not choose to leave Real Madrid, the Argentine 19-year-old came to the Spanish capital, and he loved Madrid and Real Madrid, after he has been own family, said: "Block 10 of the Champions League Real Madrid did not win, I will not leave Real Madrid." Opinion polls show that nearly 70% of fans think that, even if other clubs out of the price of € 40 million, Real Madrid should not be selling Higuain. But recently, Higuain is certainly not happy, his own future at Real Madrid, appeared shaken, declared that if Real Madrid kick the ball, he would consider leaving Real Madrid after the end of the season. It composed by admin2012.

Mourinho became the protagonist of the Bernabeu

With a 4 to 1 victory over Real Madrid in front of their fans to celebrate the team won 32 La Liga (microblogging) trophy, but even this "celebration party" game, Real Madrid have created this the season's last two records: 100 points to become the highest single-season scoring team in the Spanish history; 121 goals to become the single-season scoring team in the Spanish history, long beyond Toshack's Real Madrid to create 107 The record of the ball. Prior to the La Liga scoring record of 99 points created by Barcelona (microblogging) in the 2009-10 season, but this season, Real Madrid, "jaws", literally from the mythical universe team hand grabbed the Spanish championship the past three years, This trophy belongs to Barcelona.

Marca after the game praised, against Real Madrid, got 100 points in the league, the performance of officers and men of Real Madrid, but also can get the highest score of 10 points. The game for Real Madrid after winning, is tantamount to the "dessert", but even this game, Real Madrid have demonstrated their own hunger and thirst; as the Spanish history of the strongest Soccer Jersey wholesalechampions, Real Madrid in the final performance in the game all their advantages, Jose Mourinho's side have the strength, combat effectiveness, and rhythm, and ambitious, very cruel reflection Mallorca beat. Mallorca is not a casual team, they are the seat of the European competition, but the face of Jose Mourinho's Real Madrid, they do not have any opportunity. La Liga champions are overwhelming throughout Mallorca, Real Madrid players also gave fans a brilliant ending.

On the day before Guardiola bid farewell to the war, Barcelona, ??despite the main to make out, but eventually end up in a 2 - 2 draw. Barcelona this season the poor performance of a microcosm of embarrassment got the league this season away eight victorious transcripts after Barcelona this season 19-game road achieved 11 wins, six draws and two negative results, winning only 58 % this season, whether it is away winning the League conceded the League points this season, Barcelona and the previous three seasons, is not the best, and even some indicators record low. Pressed under Mourinho's Real Madrid, Barcelona pushed down to the altar.

"Aspen," quipped the Real Madrid La Liga titles as gift paper wrap up, give the fans, in addition to accumulating the highest score of 100 points, Real Madrid back to the fans to send a small gift of 121 balls, the Real Madrid fans for the team requirements and strict, but now, they start protecting their team. Real Madrid 38 league 32 wins, four draws and 2 losses to get 100 points, a perfect performance, even stronger than the 2009-10 season, Barcelona, ??Guardiola led the achievements made 99 points, while Real Madrid have 96 points and became the the most points in the league runner-up. But all past history, Real Madrid created a new peak (microblogging). Jose Mourinho's side got 2.63 points per game, home and away only lost 7 points, not only do the fighting and repeated wins ahead of the championship, with a history of the highest points proved his great strength. "

It is worth mentioning is that Real Madrid 100 points not only La Liga history, the top five leagues in Europe is highest in recent years 2006-07 season, Inter Milan to get 97 points in 2004-05 season, Chelsea ( microblogging) had 95 points, but Real Madrid beat them. 32 wins in a single season, Real Madrid also created a record. In addition, this field after Real Madrid scored 121 goals in the team of the league single-season goals, 128 ball away from Aston Villa in the 1930-31 season to create five major league single-season scoring record there was only 7 goals. But 70 years ago, "prehistoric era" of football and football obviously can not be compared on the level and difficulty.

After the match, Mourinho became the protagonist of the Bernabeu, he even made a staggering "bow down" action, and he said that gratitude is a Real Madrid player, he would like to thank Real Madrid got the La Liga champions broke the La Liga scoring and goals record. "In this fantastic evening, I just want to say, you become the best club in the history of Real Madrid, Real Madrid's Champions Trophy a steady stream, the team will get 100 points, the players can get 100 points of the image into the history. "

Mourinho will not stop the pace, he knew the difficulty of the Primera Liga win has become more and more "abnormal", "In this league, we have to get 94 points to win, this situation is very incredible, but next season may still be the same. "Perhaps, the 100 may not be eternal points record in La Liga. "Aspen", perhaps we can say that in another era, 100 magic record before or since, but now the standard in Real Madrid and Barcelona continue to rise, the other team in La Liga strength come farther, maybe next season will be "". The same is true in the scoring record. Including Real Madrid own pursuit of the record will not stop, Real Madrid is a face of a challenge but became a stronger team, Real Madrid, beyond their own writing legend is the biggest challenge.

CALL FOR PAPERS

2012 Sino-foreign-interchange Workshop on Intelligence Science and Intelligent Data Engineering
(IScIDE2012)
Date: Oct.15-17, 2012
Location: Nanjing, China
Please take note of submission details
Deadline: June 12, 2012. Acceptance notification: July 12, 2012.
DESCRIPTION
As one of annual events organized by Chinese Golden Triangle ISIS Forum, this workshop is scheduled as the third of a serial annual workshops that promotes the academic exchange of researches on various areas of intelligence science and intelligent data engineering in China and abroad, and will be held in Nanjing. As an old capital of China for six dynasties with long and rich cultural heritage, Nanjing is now a modern metropolis with strong comprehensive strength and regional advantages, featuring good living environment and accelerated development in science and technology, especially in software.
This workshop is aiming at a collective venue for introducing world frontier researches to China and for introducing researches of an ever developing and huge population of Chinese colleagues to international communities. The proceedings of IScIDE2011 was published as one Springer LNCS/LNAI (EI indexed), and selected papers were recommended for a special issue of Neurocomputing (SCI indexed). Not only IScIDE2012 is going to continiue this tradiation, but also efforts are made on seeking special issues by other SCI indexed international journals.
The regular presentations are made in both oral sessions and poster sessions. The workshop proceedings (Springer's LNCS/LNAI) will be published around November 2012. Authors have one month to revise manuscripts in consideration of feedbacks during presentations. The journal special issue will come in 2013. Submissions for regular presentations are here invited from researchers and scientists in academia and university and in China and all foreign counties.
TOPICS
that include, but are not limited to:
- Pattern Recognition
- Computer Vision and Image Processing
- Machine Learning and Computational Intelligence
- Knowledge Discovering, Data Mining, Web Mining
- Graphics and Computer Visualization
- Multimedia Processing and Application
- Others
WORKSHOP ORGANISATION
Organized by
Southeast University (SEU)
Nanjing University of Scie. & Tech. (NJUST)
Chinese Golden Triangle Forum of Information Science and Intelligence Science (ISIS)
General chair
Prof. Lei Xu, Chinese University of Hong Kong
Program Committee Chairs
Prof. Jian Yang, Nanjing Univerisity of Scie. & Tech.
Prof. Fang Fang, Peking University
Prof. Changyin Sun, Southeast University
Invitation Committee Chairs
Prof. Xiaofei He, Zhejiang University
Prof. Xinbo Gao, Xidian University
IMPORTANT DATES
June 12, 2012 Papers submission
July 12, 2012 Notification of acceptance & invitation letters & Registration
Aug. 30, 2012 Camera ready papers submission
CONTACT
youngwankou@yeah.net, iscide2012@gmail.com

This is the extraordinary power of the "old guy"

Many years later, we still clear memories from the dark rainy night in Moscow to hold the key lore of Terry, bizarre slip, put an end to the winner of the Chelsea (microblogging). Terry, then aged 28, Frank Lampard and Didier Drogba, just enter the 30-year-old mark four years of waiting, even though the veteran is still mighty, and still bring joy to give the Stamford Bridge fans, but the passage of time in fact grind them too much edge and combat power as evidenced by this year's league record of Chelsea, but the Champions League, it is still a paradise for the old guy, took part in the Moscow battle of the players, there are nine people into the game today large list of six people starting player only 30 years of age 85 years, Salomon Kalou and 87 years Meikle, others have been written for the person, club large-scale rotation of personnel is imperative. But is such an old boys club tonight but bring the fans the biggest shock and joy!

This is the extraordinary power of the "old guy" off the court.
